title: DoseSchedule
description: A specific dosing schedule for a drug or supplement.

doseValue.description: The value of the dose, e.g. 500.

frequency.description: How often the dose is taken, e.g. 'daily'.

targetPopulation.description: Characteristics of the population for which this is intended, or which typically uses it, e.g. 'adults'.

doseUnit.description: The unit of the dose, e.g. 'mg'.
